addPlayer

public boolean addPlayer(java.lang.String id,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         int color)
This adds a player to the game

Parameters:
id - id of player (0 - AI)
name - Name of player
color - Color of player
Returns:
boolean Returns true if the player is added, returns false if the player can't be added.

delPlayer

public boolean delPlayer(java.lang.String name)
This deletes a player in the game

Parameters:
name - Name of the player
Returns:
boolean Returns true if the player is deleted, returns false if the player cannot be deleted
